TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DesignerAutoFormatCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class DesignerAutoFormatCollection Implements IList
public ref class DesignerAutoFormatCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type DesignerAutoFormatCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects within a control designer.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类和任何派生的类定义属性作为对象。The class and any derived class defines the property as a object. 控件开发人员可以重写属性在派生的控件设计器中，添加自定义自动格式设置样式，并返回到可视化设计器的受支持格式的集合。Control developers can override the property in a derived control designer, add custom automatic formatting styles, and return the collection of supported formats to the visual designer. 添加对象时，集合将动态增加。The collection dynamically increases as objects are added. 在此集合中的索引是从零开始。Indexes in this collection are zero-based. 使用属性以确定集合中有多少自动样式格式。Use the property to determine how many automatic style formats are in the collection. 此外，使用方法和属性，以提供以下功能：Additionally, use the methods and properties to provide the following functionality: - 方法将一种格式添加到集合。The method to add a single format to the collection. - 方法来在集合中的特定索引处添加一种格式。The method to add a format at a particular index within the collection. - 方法来删除一种格式。The method to remove a format. - 方法移除特定索引处的格式。The method to remove the format at a particular index. - 方法来确定特定的格式是否已在集合中。The method to determine whether a particular format is already in the collection. - 方法来检索集合中的格式的索引。The method to retrieve the index of a format within the collection. - 属性来获取或设置使用数组表示法的特定索引处的格式。The property to get or set the format at a particular index, using array notation. - 方法从集合中移除所有格式。The method to remove all formats from the collection. - 属性以确定集合中的格式的数。The property to determine the number of formats in the collection. - 方法以获取集合中的格式的位置。The method to get the position of a format within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现在自定义控件设计器中的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the property in a custom control designer. 派生的控件设计器实现通过添加派生自的自定义自动格式的三个实例的属性类。The derived control designer implements the property by adding three instances of a custom automatic format that are derived from the class. [!code-csharp[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/CS/DesignerAutoFormat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerAutoFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerAutoFormat/VB/DesignerAutoFormat.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用索引器以检索集合中，或要在集合中的指定索引处设置格式的指定索引处的对象。Use the indexer to retrieve the object at the specified index within the collection or to set the format at the specified index within the collection. 可以通过使用数组表示法索引集合中的元素。You can index elements in the collection by using array notation. 例如，你可以编制索引处的元素索引`i`使用记数法`AutoFormats(i)`为 Microsoft visual Basic 或`AutoFormats[i]`对于 C#。For example, you can index an element at index `i` with the notation `AutoFormats(i)` for Microsoft VisualBasic or `AutoFormats[i]` for C#. 如果你具有对引用对象，并需要在集合中，使用对象的索引方法。When you have a reference to the object and need the index of the object in the collection, use the method.

span.span: A structure that contains the height and width of the control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检查集合中的每种格式，然后返回的最大高度和中的最大宽度结构。The property examines each format in the collection and returns the largest height and the largest width in a structure. 可视设计器，如[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，使用来确定的初始大小**AutoFormat**对话框。A visual designer, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], uses the to determine the initial size of the **AutoFormat** dialog box. 最小大小为 200 的 200 像素。The minimum size is 200-by-200 pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除的第一个匹配项`format`从集合。The method removes the first occurrence of `format` from the collection. 如果对象不包含`format`，集合保持不变。If the object does not contain `format`, the collection remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 方法通过使用来确定相等性方法要比较的对象。The method determines equality by using the method on the objects that are being compared. 方法执行线性搜索; 因此，平均执行时间成比例值。The method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value. 若要从集合中移除特定索引处的格式，使用方法。To remove a format at a particular index from the collection, use the method. 若要从集合中移除所有格式，使用方法。To remove all formats from the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 当从集合中移除项时，索引值更改为集合中的后续项。When you remove an item from a collection, the index values change for subsequent items in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举整个集合不是一个线程安全的过程本质上。Enumerating through a collection is not a thread-safe procedure intrinsically. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection. 这会枚举过程中导致异常。This causes exceptions during enumeration. 通过使用锁定集合若要确保线程安全性在整个枚举期间的方法。Lock the collection by using the method during the entire enumeration to guarantee thread safety. 有关线程安全的访问的锁定集合的详细信息，请参阅。For detailed information about locking collections for thread-safe access, see .
